nodes.text: I owe my life to Britain... I want to give Britain just a tiny bit back for what Britain has given me.
He would have been punished in a LAGER
He said he would have been one of those killed in a concentration camp if it wasn't for Winston Churchill and for Britain
Mr Howard hit a personal note as he described how his mother-in-law had died from a hospital-acquired infection and how his grandmother had been killed in a Nazi concentration camp.
If his grandmother met the requirements to be punished in a LAGER he would have met the requirements as well
